attributes.description:
Buses pick up passengers on the Track 2/inbound side at Ashland.

The new Worcester Line schedule effective on Saturday, December 23rd is available for pick up at Back Bay or South Station and you can download it on the MBTA website.
attributes.header: Ashland station will re-open on Saturday, December 23rd. A free shuttle bus operates between Ashland and Framingham to connect with Worcester Line trains through Friday, December 22nd.
attributes.short_header: As of on Aug 26th & through Fall 2023, Ashland station will be closed to allow for critical improvement work. A free shuttle bus service wil
